alert.note: Alert for Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 12:01PM EDT until May 08 at 6:31AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Sherman Creek At Shermans Dale affecting Perry County. For the Sherman Creek...including Shermans Dale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sherman Creek At Shermans Dale. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, River Road is closed upstream of Shermansdale. At 7.0 feet, River Road is closed upstream of Shermansdale. At 9.0 feet, Several homes along Creek Road are affected by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 9.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement willl be issued late tonight by 1200 AM EDT.
